Class DefaultPropertiesTestLibrary

              +--net.sourceforge.jtds.test.DefaultPropertiesTestLibrary
All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConnectionJDBC2UnitTest.Test_ConnectionJDBC2_unpackProperties, DriverUnitTest.Test_Driver_getPropertyInfo, DriverUnitTest.Test_Driver_setupConnectProperties, JtdsDataSourceUnitTest.Test_JtdsDataSource_addNonNullProperties, JtdsDataSourceUnitTest.Test_JtdsDataSource_fields, JtdsDataSourceUnitTest.Test_JtdsDataSource_getReference, JtdsObjectFactoryUnitTest.Test_JtdsObjectFactory_getObjectInstance_DefaultValues
public abstract class DefaultPropertiesTestLibrary
extends junit.framework.TestCase

Library for testing default properties.

Uses a DefaultPropertiesTester object to test different methods in different classes.

To extend this class, the programmer must implement the following items:

  1. Set the #tester field in a public default constructor that takes no arguments.
  2. A public static Test suite() method that takes one or more arguments. (The suite() method in this class should not be overridden.)

Version:
$Id: DefaultPropertiesTestLibrary.java,v 1.26 2007/07/12 20:34:47 bheineman Exp $
Author:
David D. Kilzer
